"Xiandy": "Alright, let me just take some data."
"YO! It's ya boi, Instructor Speeder! I heard all about it."
"I've got the SICKEST Field Race course set up for that research of yours."
"Whattaya say, pal? Wanna shred it up?"
"I look forward to seein' you clutch a new record out there. Aight, peace!"
"...Instructor Speeder. He just... invited himself into our comm-line, I see."
